short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension adds additional functionality to the Maker World website for designers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your MakerWorld experience with our handy browser extension! Instantly view 'Hot Scores', track 'Reward Points', estimate 'Value Towards Gift Cards', and see contest participation for your favorite designs. We're refining our features and appreciate your input to improve. Share your thoughts and help shape the future of your creative journey on MakerWorld!

This is now open source if you would like to help make the extension better! https://github.com/huddleboards/maker-world-extension

Once you install this, simply go to a user page, such as https://makerworld.com/en/@ozarkexpedition. Then go to a specific model, such as  https://makerworld.com/en/models/390175.

This is now available to all regions by selection your region in the extension's popup window. 

Note: This extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by MakerWorld. This is an independent project developed to enhance user experience with MakerWorld designers.
